basic.description: This course discusses topics such as signal analysis, Fourier series/Fourier transform, sampling theorem, distortions and attenuation in signal transmission, and analog modulation AM, FM, pulse-code modulation, and pulse shaping.
basic.subject: EEL
basic.title: Introduction to Communications

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EEL 3112, EEL 3135, and MAP 3305 or MAS 3105.
